sentences.en: Bands of gunmen have hijacked food shipments and terrorized relief workers.
sentences.cn: 几伙持枪歹徒劫持了运输的食品，还恐吓了救援人员。

sentences.en: He let out a long sigh, mainly of relief, partly of sadness.
sentences.cn: 他长叹一口气，主要是因为如释重负，也有一部分是因为伤心。

sentences.en: His employer greeted him with an effusion of relief.
sentences.cn: 他的雇主看到他大松一口气。

sentences.en: I felt a huge surge of relief and happiness.
I felt a tremendous sense of relief and exultation.
sentences.cn: 我感到非常放松，无比欢喜。

sentences.en: Jessica settled into her chair with a small sigh of relief.
sentences.cn: 杰茜卡微微松了口气，坐到了椅子上。

sentences.en: Marauding gangs of armed men have been looting food relief supplies.
sentences.cn: 持械抢劫团伙一直在四处抢劫救济食品。

sentences.en: Marijuana can provide pain relief for some cancer patients.
sentences.cn: 大麻可以为一些癌症患者减轻疼痛。

sentences.en: Mary Ann was flooded with relief .
money raised for the relief effort
No one was hurt, and we all breathed a sigh of relief .
sentences.cn: 没有人受伤，我们都松了一口气。

sentences.en: Rainy weather brings blessed relief to hay fever victims.
sentences.cn: 雨天会给枯草热患者带来欣喜，减轻他们的痛苦。

sentences.en: Relief and gratitude were written all over his face.
Relief workers are still searching through collapsed buildings looking for victims.
sentences.cn: 救援人员仍然在倒塌的建筑中搜寻罹难者。

sentences.en: Sugar gives quick relief to hunger but provides no lasting nourishment.
sentences.cn: 糖能快速缓解饥饿感，但不能提供持久的营养。

sentences.en: The agency says international relief agencies also have pitched in.
sentences.cn: 该机构说国际救援机构也提供了支援。

sentences.en: The civil war is obstructing distribution of famine relief by aid agencies.
sentences.cn: 内战阻碍着救援机构对饥荒赈济物资的配给。

sentences.en: The country's politicians are already heaving a collective sigh of relief.
sentences.cn: 该国的政界人士均已松了口气。

sentences.en: The proceeds from the concert will go towards famine relief.
sentences.cn: 音乐会的收入将用于救助饥荒。

words.tran_cn: 解除，减轻；使不单调乏味；换…的班；解围；使放心

phrases.tran_cn: n. 喜剧性穿插；喜剧性调剂
接受公共救济的：因为需要或贫困而接受公共救济的
n. 地势图；立体模型地图
救灾物资；救援物质（relief material的复数，常用复数）

trans.tran_cn: 宽慰，解脱，减轻，救济，轻松场面，接替人，解围，浮雕，醒目，突出品质
trans.tran_en: when something reduces someone’s pain or unhappy feelings
